text: Gyanesh Sharma (born 28 February 1963) is currently serving as Corporator from Thakur Pyarelal Ward 40 of Raipur Municipal Corporation and also the member of Chhattisgarh State Congress Committee and the Chairman of the Media Department in State Congress Committee of Chhattisgarh. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Chhattisgarh politicians
title: Gyanesh Sharma
